comment:
- BIAB all grain in 5 L of water at 67°c rest 60min.
- Sparge in a separate pot with 4 L at 70 °c rest for 10 min.
- Add extract to the 9 L and bring to boil.
- Add hops follow recipe for timing.
- Cool down and  transfer in fermenter.
- Add Yeast and dry hops.
- keep ferment 2 weeks but remove dry hops after 10 days.
- bottle or keg
